flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
Current Bluetooth earphones are too expensive. They often lack stereo or hands-free communication.

I'll guide you how to mod an old/cheap stereo headset with a Bluetooth simple adapter from eBay.

Total cost of the Project is ~ 27€ (38$), or less , if you already got the earphones.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Current Bluetooth earphones are too expensive. They often lack stereo or hands-free communication.

I'll guide you how to mod an old/cheap stereo headset with a Bluetooth simple adapter from eBay.

Total cost of the Project is ~ 27€ (38$), or less , if you already got the earphones.

Relevant parts
  • cheap stereo earphones
  • Bluetooth A2P Adapter (14$ from eBay)
Tools
  • Scissors
  • Screwdriver
  • adhesive tape
  • cable stripper
  • solder tool

parts.notes: better the ones that leave the cable for one side

guide.summary: DIY Bluetooth Headset. Enjoy your music wirelessly and for less than  $40.
